title: IMRB - Mondor Biomedical Research Institute
cleaned_text: The Mondor Institute for Biomedical Research (IMRB, U955 Inserm - Université Paris Est Créteil, UPEC) is one of the main biomedical research centres in the eastern part of the Paris region with national and international influence. The research teams develop high-level translational research in a wide variety of fields in direct connection with healthcare services.
